title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Display the values in a dynamic text item.
3. Display the values in a data/text item.
4. Compare the format of the datetime values in both items.
